"They got a ringer for the next match. They say he's a void lord or somethingâ€¦" - Gurgthock

name: The Ring of Blood: The Blue Brothers
effect:
As a cost to place this quest face up, choose an opponent, and he may put two Broken Arena ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw two cards.
"It's not too late to chicken out. I'd certainly understand." - Gurgthock

name: The Ring of Blood: The Final Challenge
effect:
As a cost to place this quest face up, put 2 damage on your hero.
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.
"Oh boy. Mogor has invoked his right of battle as hero of the Warmaul. You have to fight him!" - Gurgthock

name: The Ring of Blood: The Warmaul Champion
effect:
As a cost to place this quest face up, put the top three cards of your deck into your graveyard.
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.
"They had to ship the champion in from the Blade's Edge gladiator pits. He was training on mountain giants - three at a time." - Gurgthock

name: The Ruins of Lordaeron
effect:
When a hero or ally in your party deals damage, add an arena counter.
[Activate], Remove three arena counters ==> Put up to three target cards from one player's graveyard on the bottom of his deck.
"If anyone dies in the ring, we can bury them right away!" - Vixton Pinchwhistle

name: The Seal of Danzalar
effect: At the start of your turn, your hero deals shadow damage to target hero equal to the number of cards in your hand minus the number of cards in that hero's controller's hand.

name: The Sowing of Seeds
effect: Talent: Balance

name: The Taste of Arcana
effect: Talent: Arcane

name: Thomas "Slash" Robinson
effect: Remove an ally card in your graveyard from the game ==> Thomas has ferocity this turn.
"Yes. Let's end this."

name: Thoros the Savior
effect: Talent: Holy
Professions: Alchemy, Engineering
"None shall harm those beneath my shield!"

name: Tidal Mastery
effect: Talent: Restoration
When the elements align, the result is overwhelming.

name: Tiger's Fury
effect: Talent: Feral
"Joo can't reason with de beast, mon. Joo just got to put it down." - Sharpeye Yan'ja

name: Tor'gor Darkfire
effect:
Hardiness (If this ally would be dealt damage, prevent 1 of it.)
Destroy another ally in your party ==> Tor'gor heals all damage from himself.
"Sacrifice if necessary in battle."

name: Trakas
effect: 3, Destroy Trakas ==> Destroy target ally or equipment.
"I will sacrifice whatever it takes."

name: Tremor Shock
effect: Talent: Elemental

name: Tribemother Torra
effect: Talent: Restoration
Professions: Engineering, Jewelcrafting
"We are on a journey together with the spirits. We cannot stray from their path."

name: Twinblade of the Phoenix
effect: You can play Twinblade of the Phoenix from your graveyard.
The blade will rise again, but its victims never will.

name: Tyrus Lionheart
effect:
Protector
Tyrus has +4 ATK while defending.
"Patience is not weakness."

name: Uncatalogued Species
effect:
Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Name a standard race, then reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed ally card of that race into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"A new species! Are you sure?" - Lauranna Thar'well

name: Utopia
effect: Talent: Balance
"It is unwise to upset the Earth Mother." - Brahu Starsear

name: Valeera Sanguinar
effect: You may discard an Arena card rather than pay Valeera's cost.

"I Take my anger out on our enemies!
Unlike some grouchesâ€¦"

name: Vengeful Gladiator's Felshroud
effect:
On your turn, you can play ability cards that are removed from the game.
[Activate] ==> Put target opposing ally into its owner's hand.
"Having power is not enough. You must wield itâ€¦publicly." - Kristoff Manchester

name: Vengeful Gladiator's Piercing Touch
effect: 1, Remove an ability card in your graveyard from the game ==> Vengeful Gladiator's Piercing Touch has +1 ATK this turn.

name: Victimize
effect: Talent: Subtlety, Affliction
"Identify a victim, ruin him, then disappear." - Garona: A Study on Stealth and Treachery

name: Vol'jin
effect: Vol'jin has +X ATK, where X is the combined damage on Trolls in your party.
"You make big mistake, mon."

name: Volley
effect: Talent: Marksmanship

name: Voltrinnia
effect:
Protector
Arcane Torrent
At the start of each opponent's turn, target ally in his party loses and can't have powers this turn.

name: Wand of the Forgotten Star
effect: When combat damage is dealt with Wand of the Forgotten Star to a hero, that hero's controller puts that many cards from the top of his deck into his graveyard.
It pulses with magic from realms long since forgotten.

name: Witch Doctor Koo'zar
effect: Talent: Discipline
Professions: Mining, Engineering
"It's best not to be messin' wit me."

name: World Breaker
effect: On your turn: 6, [Activate], Destroy World Breaker ==> Destroy all resources.
One swing can turn any Azeroth into Draenor.

name: Wynnd the Spry
effect:
Elusive (Can't be attacked.)
Wynnd has +1 ATK for each exhausted opposing resource.
"I move as swiftly and softly as the breeze."

name: Yoink!
effect: Talent: Subtlety
"Allow me to lighten your load."
